question: Sophia has two times as many Snapchat friends as Claire. Carl has one times as many friends on Snapchat as Claire. If Sophia has 130 friends on Snapchat, how many Snapchat friends does Carl have?
answer:
Claire has 130/2 = <<130/2=65>>65 Snapchat friends.
Carl has 1*65 = <<1*65=65>>65 Snapchat friends.
#### 65
